content: Awesome advice, Darius! I am still at college and I was in a “interview about some contest” (it was closed door, 1–on-1 though) The interviewer asked me, will you still pursue what course you are taking now after you graduate in college? I honestly, said yes, but.. (there was a but) Then, I told this story of mine to the Dean of our School (department) He told me, focus on one thing. Be good, better, best at it.
